item.title: Thembeka
item.description: About me You can briefly describe your intrests and background here. If you can send me a cover photo and caption too that would be great. That will then go across the top of the screen. Current project overview Exotic grasses have proven problematic in natural veld, reducing biodiversity and productivity. Vetiver (Chrysopogon zizanioides) is a fast-growing, tall exotic grass (from India) with deep roots (approximately 3m) allowing it to withstand extreme environmental conditions such as drought, frost, and flood.
